languages.text: {n}Рассмеявшись, Комиссар одобрительно восклицает:{/n} "Соратники, в наших рядах пополнение! Император не оставляет нас своей милостью!"
{n}The Commissar laughs and exclaims approvingly,{/n} "My brothers and sisters in arms, a new fighter has joined our ranks! The Emperor's grace is with us!"
languages.original_text: {n}Рассмеявшись, Комиссар одобрительно восклицает:{/n} "Соратники, в наших рядах пополнение! Император не оставляет нас своей милостью!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The Commissar laughs and exclaims approvingly,{/n} "My comrades, a new fighter has joined our ranks! The Emperor's grace is with us!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}政委大笑起来，发出了赞许的呼声。{/n}“兄弟们，姐妹们！一位新的战士加入了我们的队伍！愿帝皇的恩典与我们同在！”
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar laughs and exclaims approvingly,{/n} "My brothers and sisters in arms, a new fighter has joined our ranks! The Emperor's grace is with us!"

traits.locale_text: {n}政委大笑起来，发出了赞许的呼声。{/n}“兄弟们，姐妹们！一位新的战士加入了我们的队伍！愿帝皇的恩典与我们同在！”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}コミッサーは笑い、大きな声で仲間に呼びかけた。{/n}「勇敢なる兄弟姉妹よ、新たな仲間が部隊に加わった！皇帝の恩寵は我らと共にある！」
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar laughs and exclaims approvingly,{/n} "My brothers and sisters in arms, a new fighter has joined our ranks! The Emperor's grace is with us!"

traits.locale_text: {n}コミッサーは笑い、大きな声で仲間に呼びかけた。{/n}「勇敢なる兄弟姉妹よ、新たな仲間が部隊に加わった！皇帝の恩寵は我らと共にある！」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}El Comisario se ríe y exclama con aprobación:{/n} «¡Camaradas míos, un{mf||a} nuev{mf|o|a} guerrer{mf|o|a} se ha unido a nuestras filas! ¡La gracia del Emperador está con nosotros!».
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar laughs and exclaims approvingly,{/n} "My brothers and sisters in arms, a new fighter has joined our ranks! The Emperor's grace is with us!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El Comisario se ríe y exclama con aprobación:{/n} «¡Camaradas míos, un{mf||a} nuev{mf|o|a} guerrer{mf|o|a} se ha unido a nuestras filas! ¡La gracia del Emperador está con nosotros!».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar laughs and exclaims approvingly,{/n} "My brothers and sisters in arms, a new fighter has joined our ranks! The Emperor's grace is with us!"

languages.text: {n}Le commissaire rit et exprime avec véhémence son approbation :{/n} « Mes frères, mes sœurs ! {mf|Un nouvel allié|Une nouvelle alliée} rejoint nos rangs ! La grâce de l'Empereur est avec nous ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar laughs and exclaims approvingly,{/n} "My brothers and sisters in arms, a new fighter has joined our ranks! The Emperor's grace is with us!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le commissaire rit et exprime avec véhémence son approbation :{/n} « Mes frères, mes sœurs ! {mf|Un nouvel allié|Une nouvelle alliée} rejoint nos rangs ! La grâce de l'Empereur est avec nous ! »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Der Kommissar lacht und ruft wohlwollend:{/n} "Waffenbrüder und -schwestern, {mf|ein neuer Kämpfer|eine neue Kämpferin} hat sich unseren Rehen angeschlossen! Die Gunst des Imperators ist mit uns!"
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar laughs and exclaims approvingly,{/n} "My brothers and sisters in arms, a new fighter has joined our ranks! The Emperor's grace is with us!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Kommissar lacht und ruft wohlwollend:{/n} "Waffenbrüder und -schwestern, {mf|ein neuer Kämpfer|eine neue Kämpferin} hat sich unseren Rehen angeschlossen! Die Gunst des Imperators ist mit uns!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Komiser gülüyor, onaylarcasına haykırıyor.{/n} "Silah arkadaşlarım, yeni bir savaşçı saflarımıza katıldı! İmparator, lütfunu bize takdis etti!"
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar laughs and exclaims approvingly,{/n} "My brothers and sisters in arms, a new fighter has joined our ranks! The Emperor's grace is with us!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Komiser gülüyor ve onaylayarak haykırıyor.{/n} "Silah arkadaşlarım, yeni bir dövüşçü saflarımıza katıldı! İmparator'un lütfu bizimle!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
